headline: Oracle Uses Red Bull F1 Partnership To Showcase AI And Cloud Strengths
summary: Oracle (NYSE:ORCL) and Oracle Red Bull Racing announced a multi year extension and expansion of their technology partnership ahead of major Formula 1 regulation changes. Oracle's AI and cloud tools are now central to race strategy, power unit development, and fan engagement for the team. The partnership includes an AI powered strategy agent and extensive use of Oracle Cloud to help engineer a new hybrid power unit. Oracle cloud applications are being used to support operational excellence...
